scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:fake-auth" "npm run start:fake-priority" "npm run start:local-queue" "npm run start:worker-priority" "npm run start:worker-prisma" "npm run start:prisma-service" "npm run start:api-gateway"
scripts.start:fake-auth: concurrently "npx nx build fake-auth" "npx nx serve fake-auth"
scripts.start:fake-priority: concurrently "npx nx build fake-priority" "npx nx serve fake-priority"
scripts.start:local-queue: concurrently "npx nx build local-queue" "npx nx serve local-queue"
scripts.start:worker-priority: concurrently "npx nx build worker-priority" "npx nx serve worker-priority"
scripts.start:worker-prisma: concurrently "npx nx build worker-prisma" "npx nx serve worker-prisma"
scripts.start:prisma-service: concurrently  "npx nx build prisma-service" "npx nx serve prisma-service"
scripts.start:api-gateway: concurrently "npx nx build api-gateway" "npx nx serve api-gateway"
